pages.title: Home
pages.purpose: Overview of the Terraform GCP infrastructure repository, its purpose, high-level architecture, and key components

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.purpose: Guide for initial setup, prerequisites, and first-time deployment of the infrastructure

pages.title: Core Configuration
pages.purpose: Overview of the foundational Terraform configuration components that establish the deployment environment

pages.title: Provider and Backend Configuration
pages.purpose: Detailed explanation of the Terraform provider setup and GCS backend configuration for state management (most critical component)

pages.title: Variables and Locals
pages.purpose: Documentation of input variables and local values that configure the infrastructure deployment

pages.title: State Management
pages.purpose: Architecture and best practices for remote state storage, locking, and team collaboration

pages.title: Infrastructure Resources
pages.purpose: Overview of the GCP resources provisioned by this Terraform configuration

pages.title: Service Accounts
pages.purpose: Identity management through GCP service accounts for Terraform operations and BigQuery access

pages.title: BigQuery Datasets
pages.purpose: BigQuery dataset configuration, access control, and data lifecycle policies

pages.title: Storage and APIs
pages.purpose: Supporting infrastructure including GCS buckets and API configurations

pages.title: Outputs and Integration
pages.purpose: Exported values and interfaces for integrating deployed infrastructure with external systems

pages.title: Security Architecture
pages.purpose: Security model, IAM roles, access control patterns, and best practices for protecting sensitive data

pages.title: Development Workflow
pages.purpose: Overview of development practices, tooling, and automation for working with this repository

pages.title: Version Control Practices
pages.purpose: Git workflow, file exclusions, and best practices for managing Terraform code in version control

pages.title: Provider Version Management
pages.purpose: Managing Terraform provider versions and ensuring consistent environments across team members

pages.title: CI/CD Automation
pages.purpose: GitHub Actions workflows and automation for documentation and deployment pipelines
